data.title: Charlie Shanian

data.text:
Charlie Shanian portrays the Apprentice in the Season 5 episode "Happily Ever After".

Biography[]

Charlie Shanian was born in Peabody, Massachusetts in 1965. He attended and graduated from Peabody Veterans Memorial High School in 1983. He married Tori Spelling, the daughter of Aaron and Candy Spelling, in 2004 and divorced in 2006. He was a member of Gotham City Improv in New York for many years and performed with them off- and off-off-Broadway. He is of Armenian ancestry.

Career[]

Charmed

10-8: Officers on Duty

Le Chase
